ygData.subject: Re: Comment on Solric's comment...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is also the point of the Christmas (I think) expansion set. One of the thing they said is that they fully expect 3D cards to have improved a lot by
ygData.messageBody:
According to Cristie:
> Good point.. hadn't thought of that but it makes perfect sense. Maybe the
> video card companies should just send everyone a great 400 meg 3d
> card...heh.. don't we wish...wonder if they will ever make something like
> that in our lifetime... I suppose 3d would be a thing of the past at that
> point...probably just have little bitty people in our box to do the stuff
> for us. Freaky thought.

This is also the point of the Christmas (I think) expansion set. One of
the thing they said is that they fully expect 3D cards to have improved
a lot by the time, so the lower end will rise.

Heck, just color swap some effects, and you get a large palette of
effects. No programming at all :)
